actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide that the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Michigan shall be held at Mount Pleasant, Michigan, in addition to the places currently provided by law.

summary.text: Provides that the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Michigan be held at Mount Pleasant, Michigan, in addition to those places currently provided by law.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Michigan shall be held at Mount Pleasant, Michigan, in addition to the places currently provided by law.
